content: Call to action content paragraph

sections.content:
• While in college, I learned a little about programming and development from a friend of mine. Ever since that experience, I immediatly knew that development was my passion and I've been creating ever since.
  • I joined a development program to give myself a leg up and to solidify my knowledge.

• I enjoy reading books about various topics including Sales, Psychology, Biology, History, Economics, and various fiction novels as well.
  • I try to apply the things that I learn by seeing how they can help me approach and solve problems.

• University of South Alabama | Bachelor of English Education
  • Double Major, completed 140 credit hours. Graduated in May 2022
  • President's list for two years. Vice President of Tau Kappa Epsilon Fraternity.

• Developer Portfolio version 4
  • Croatian Coasts and Riche Fashion Layouts.
  • PHP and JS coding Challenges from Exercises for Programmers 4.

• Middle School English Teacher Internship | Jan 2022 - May 2022
  • Taught 8th Grade English in accordance with Alabama State English curriculum standards for half of the school year.
